title: Cider Week
seo_title: Cider Week | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Fall’s most celebrate beverage gets its own week here in New York.
preview: Fall’s most celebrate beverage gets its own week here in New York.
contents: Fall’s most celebrate beverage gets its own week here in New York. “Join the hard cider revival,” the event commands, and we’re happy to oblige. Expect cider-centric dinners and tastings from the likes of Murray’s Cheese, Astor Wines & Spirits and Macelleria in Meatpacking. Check the website for more details.
